siteMetadata.title: Tigran Hakobyan's personal blog
siteMetadata.subtitle: Long-form thoughts on building software, education and remote work.

frontmatter.title: 2018 In Review
frontmatter.description: Seeing others sharing their 2018 year in the review made me want to write my own summary of 2018. It's always interesting to look back and reflect on the past year. It's also a good opportunity to document the things you've accomplished throughout the year and set some loose goals for the next year.
